akn:section.akn:heading: Common docking system standard to enable rescue

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 71301. Common docking system standard to enable rescue In order to maximize the ability to rescue astronauts whose space vehicles have become disabled, the Administrator shall enter into discussions with the appropriate representatives of spacefaring nations who have or plan to have crew transportation systems capable of orbital flight or flight beyond low Earth orbit for the purpose of agreeing on a common docking system standard. (Pub. L. 111–314, § 3, Dec. 18, 2010, 124 Stat. 3439.)
